title: Taking the Virgin Intern
description: Getting deflowered by her charismatic older coworker isn't on Molly's agenda. But their steamy office flirting weakens her resolve to remain a virgin. When the man corners her in the storage room with unwholesome intentions, Molly has to decide whether to submit to his brutal seduction--and her own dark desires. Will she let him forcefully initiate her into the pleasures of the flesh?
author: Angelina Blake
